test.name: Test Open All Highlights Page

kw.name: Open All Highlights Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.
Open the All Highlights page

kw.name: Verify All Highlights Page Loaded
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.
Verify that the All Highlights page is loaded by checking the header

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Verify that opening the All Highlights page directly loads the page and displays the header and highlight items.

test.name: Test Click Highlight Item

kw.name: Open All Highlights Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.
Open the All Highlights page

kw.name: Verify All Highlights Page Loaded
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.
Verify that the All Highlights page is loaded by checking the header

kw.name: Click First Highlight Item
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
Click first highlight item

kw.name: Verify Highlight Detail Page Loaded
Get Location
kw.doc: Returns the current browser window URL.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
Verify that the highlight detail page is loaded by checking the URL

kw.name: Go Back
kw.doc: Simulates the user clicking the back button on their browser.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Verify that clicking the highlight item navigates to the highlight detail page.
